column1: '''''Sotheby's English Literature, History, Children's Books, and Illustrations 16 December 2004''''' is an auction catalogue from [[Sotheby's]] (London).
*The description for Lot 394 (p. 274) includes quotes from an unpublished letter from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to schoolchildren (cf. [[Letter to a Primary School in Acocks Green]]).
*The description for Lot 395 (p. 274) quotes a brief inscription by Tolkien to [[George Sayer
